text: [Ej musrikon] Agar xohoni piruzi [ʙar musulmonon va farorasidani azoʙi ilohi hasted], inak piruzii [Islom, ki ʙuzurgtarin ranc va azoʙi sumost] ʙa suroƣaton omad.Va agar [az kufru dusmani ʙo pajomʙar] dast ʙardored, on [kor] ʙarojaton ʙehtar ast, va [-le] agar [ʙa cang ʙo musulmonon] ʙargarded, mo niz ʙarmegardem.Va [inro ʙidoned] ki guruhi sumo, harcand zijod ʙosad, hargiz nametavonad sumoro az cize ʙenijoz kunad va [digar] inki [hamvora] Alloh taolo ʙo mu'minon ast
